sentences.en: A decision will be taken at the culmination of the initial research.
sentences.cn: 在初始阶段研究结束时将作出决议.

sentences.en: After an initial burst of enthusiasm for jogging, I gradually lost interest.
sentences.cn: 一时的热情过去之后, 我对慢跑逐渐失去了兴趣.

sentences.en: After she'd overcome her initial shyness, she became very friendly.
sentences.cn: 她克服了起初的羞怯之后, 变得十分友善.

sentences.en: After some initial problems, acetone was successfully produced in quantity.
sentences.cn: 解决了最初的一些问题之后，终于成功地制造出了大量丙酮。

sentences.en: An initial fee is payable to the franchiser.
sentences.cn: 应该付给经销商一笔先期费用.

sentences.en: I'm also not crazy about the initial terms of the deal.
sentences.cn: 我对该协议的最初条款也不太满意。

sentences.en: It was launched last year in paperback with an initial print run of 7,000 copies.
sentences.cn: 这本书的平装本在去年推出，首次印数为7,000册。

sentences.en: It's very sporting of you to give me an initial advantage.
sentences.cn: 你开局先让我一步,真是够大方的.

sentences.en: Now that the initial shock was wearing off, he was in considerable pain.
sentences.cn: 最初的震惊渐渐过去之后，他感到疼痛难忍。

sentences.en: The agreement has been initial ( l ) ed in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 协定已在北京 草签.

sentences.en: The aim of this initial meeting is to clarify the issues.
sentences.cn: 本次初步会议的目标是澄清这些问题。

sentences.en: The business quickly repaid the initial outlay on advertising.
sentences.cn: 这家公司很快偿付了初期的广告费。

sentences.en: The experiments have given initial results eventually.
sentences.cn: 那些试验总算初见成效了.

sentences.en: The initial reaction of most participants is fear.
sentences.cn: 多数参与者的最初反应是恐惧。

sentences.en: The initial response has been encouraging.
sentences.cn: 最初的反应情况很乐观。

sentences.en: They learnt a lot from the initial market testing exercise.
sentences.cn: 他们从最初的市场测试中了解了许多信息。

phrases.tran_cn: 原设计，初步设计；初始设计
起始粒子数反转；原始群体
初始公开发行；首次公募
初态；起始状态，开始状态
初始值；原始价值；基础资料

trans.tran_en: the first letter of someone’s first name

trans.tran_cn: 用姓名的首字母签名于
trans.tran_en: to write your initials on a document to make it official or to show that you agree with something
